DOC.brief_summary: Acitretin , give combiantion pioglitazone might achieve good and/or rapid control moderate severe chronic plaque type psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Acitretin Plus Pioglitazone Patients With Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Patients chronic plaque type psoriasis body surface area involvement > 20 % Patients either sex Females complete family tubectomized postmenopausal i.e . menstrual bleeding least 1 year Age range 1865 year Females child bear potential H/O hypersensitivity acitretin Impaired hepatic function ( serum bilirubin , AST , ALT alkaline phosphatase > 1.5 time upper limit normal ) Impaired renal function ( serum creatinine > 1.5mg % male > 1.4 mg % female ) Hyperlipidemia BMI > 30 kg /m2 H/O excessive alcohol use Diabetes mellitus Congestive heart failure Ischemic heart disease
